text: "Simple Man" is a 1973 song by Lynyrd Skynyrd and is the fourth track from their debut studio album (Pronounced 'Lĕh-'nérd 'Skin-'nérd). The song is one of the most popular songs and became their third best-selling digital download single after Sweet Home Alabama and Free Bird. It has been covered by Shinedown == References == Category:1973 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Lynyrd Skynyrd songs Category:Shinedown songs Category:Southern rock songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Simple Man (Lynyrd Skynyrd song)
